lead_paragraph: Boston Red Sox third baseman Pablo Sandoval, a $95 million free agent who lost his starting job before going on the disabled list, will have exploratory surgery on his left shoulder to determine the source of the injury.

headline.print_headline: Red Sox 3B Pablo Sandoval to Have Surgery on Left Shoulder
headline.main: Red Sox 3B Pablo Sandoval to Have Surgery on Left Shoulder
